resources.name: a

fields.name: Generation_kW
fields.description: Power generated by PV plant in kW
fields.title: Generation

fields.name: Grid_Feed-In_kW
fields.description: Power fed back to the grid in kW
fields.title: Grid feed

fields.name: Grid_Supply_kW
fields.description: Power drawn from the grid in kW
fields.title: Grid supply

fields.name: Overall_Consumption_Calc_kW
fields.description:
Calculated (!) local power consumption:
Overall_Consumption_Calc_kW = Generation_kW - Grid_Feed-In_kW + Grid_Supply_kW
fields.title: Overall consumption

resources.description:
Data on grid feed and grid supply of power plant C.

This is a different type of measurement as typically used for smaller PV systems (< 30 kW). Here, only the grid feed-in and supply are measured. It is thus  not possible to calculate the power consumed in the facility, yet it is still possible to identify potentials to reduce grid supply.
resources.title: Power plant C

name: pv-optimization
title: PV Optimization
description:
PV Optimization 

The power values in kW refer to the average over the 15min period.
